value:
$WmMPID_アルヴィス,ch06_09_Alvis_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I must ensure the Fire Emblem of
House Velthomer becomes a symbol
of justice to people everywhere.$k$p

$WmMPID_ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I'll never give up! After all, when I
claimed this blade, with it came all
the experience of the Hero Hartmut!$k$p

$WmMPID_ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Normal,Face|$w0|While the stone can stop the Demon
King, its power is drawn from human
will—the heart's desire for peace...$k$p

$WmMPID_ミスト,ch09_03_Mist_F_Normal,Face|$w0|The medallion belongs in Serenes
Forest. My mother...was only holding
it for Lillia.$k$p

$WmMPID_クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Hear me, Naga! In the name of the
exalted blood, I ask for the divine
dragon's power! Baptize me in fire!$k$p

$WmMPID_伝承マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Legend01,Face|$w0|I was taught that sometimes victory
requires sacrifice, but...I want to win
without losing anyone!$k$p
